name: Factorio
description: Factorio is a game about building and creating automated factories to produce items of increasing complexity, within an infinite 2D world. Use your imagination to design your factory, combine simple elements into ingenious structures, and finally protect it from the creatures who don't really like you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10, 8, 7, Vista (64 Bit) Processor: Dual core 3Ghz+ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB Video Memory Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Low sprite resolution and Low VRAM usage.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10, 8, 7 (64 Bit) Processor: Quad core 3Ghz+ Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 2GB Video memory Storage: 1 GB available space
